meanings.definition: A message sent by air mail.
meanings.sent1: I received two aerograms from my pen pal in France.
meanings.sent2: My grandma used to send me aerograms when I was a kid.
meanings.sent3: The aerograms were like little flying messengers bringing good news.
meanings.sent4: The aerograms floated into my mailbox like delicate paper airplanes.
meanings.sent5: The aerograms fluttered down from the sky, carrying secrets within.

meanings.definition: A sheet of lightweight paper for writing a letter.
meanings.sent1: She wrote her apology on a delicate aerogram and sent it off.
meanings.sent2: I prefer using aerograms for writing letters when I travel.
meanings.sent3: The aerogram felt like a feather in my hand as I penned my thoughts.
meanings.sent4: Her words on the aerogram danced like whispers in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The aerogram was so light, it almost floated away as I wrote on it.
